channel.title: [HELP][RS2HD] 562! [Please!]
channel.description:
Hey guys, I have been working on my server source for quite some time, and well I really want it to be successful. Its a 562 loading 602.
I have a couple of things wrong with it:
1. There is "No" 1 click pvp. <--- Want this fix the most! 2. The ancient curse interface is messed up. <-- Would be nice :) 3. People can mage or range a npc/boss and tele and it will still be attacking them. <--- This will just get people banned :L 4. You can not far-range or mage an npc. <--- Kinda annoying but I can live with it. 5. If I drop an item, no one can pick it up. <-- Would really like this fix.
Here's a video to demonstrate the pvp + ancient curses : http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SrrbaJ55je0
As you can see, I am not a very good coder. If I was, I would be able to fix this problems myself. So I am calling to the community to help me! If anyone out there can help me fix these problems and wishes to be a part of my server, they are more than welcome.
If you are a 562 RS2HD coder and know how to do most/all of this. I would be happy to allow you to work alongside me on the server. Add me on msn: ben.gamer@live.co.uk
Also, if your sat there like "LMFAO this kid has no idea!!" I do have an idea, thanks. Also this server was rather successful in august 2010.
Please Please Reply. These fixes would be amazing!
Thankyou

item.title: [HELP][RS2HD] 562! [Please!]
item.dc:creator: @garage182 garage182
item.description:
@garage182 wrote:

Please stop calling me a beginner, my account on here has been registered for 4 years, I know what I’m doing. I am just asking for some help with stuff I CAN NOT do. If you can’t help, just say. Don’t try to lower me.

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP][RS2HD] 562! [Please!]
item.dc:creator: @Untrimmed Untrimmed
item.description:
@Untrimmed wrote:

Start form delta 317, they are very nice for beginners.

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP][RS2HD] 562! [Please!]
item.dc:creator: @garage182 garage182
item.description:
@garage182 wrote:

Thanks for the suggestions, but I did not start with 562 have been playing moparscape since a server called “sun-scape1” which I think was a 194 so I dived into 317s. Once I learnt what I wanted from 317s, I moved onto 562s because I like real rs, just wish I was richer

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP][RS2HD] 562! [Please!]
item.dc:creator: @DannyIsSoPro DannyIsSoPro
item.description:
@DannyIsSoPro wrote:

Ya know, I was like you, just starting to code, and going RIGHT into 562’s.
Trust me it’s not very smart lol. I’m DECENT in coding as from where I first started.
If you just started learning, or know the basic’s, try Hyperion, or PI. PI is what I started off with, and now I know tons about them.(Not EVERYTHING LOL)
So yeah, my suggestions.
Now if your looking into actually coding your 562, look for some guides, like everywhere.

Good luck !

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP][RS2HD] 562! [Please!]

Hey guys, I have been working on my server source for quite some time, and well I really want it to be successful. Its a 562 loading 602.

I have a couple of things wrong with it:
